ExtlRecShrObject.name: ExtlRecShrObject
ExtlRecShrObject.description: Represents a shared object for Partner Connect.

DefaultRecordOwnerId.description: ID of the shared record owner. The owner can be a user or a queue, represented by a Group ID.

ExtlObjectType.description: Object type in the external org or system that is part of the object field mapping.

ExtlRecShrCnctId.description: ID of the external record share connection.
